description: Runs a speedtest and prints the result, uses speedtest package.
short: Runs a speedtest and prints the result.
install_msg:
Thanks for downloading speedtest cog.
⚠️ Before using that cog you will need to install Ookla's speedtest package (and **not** speedtest-cli, if you have this package you will have to uninstall it, `sudo apt-get remove speedtest-cli` and `pip uninstall speedtest-cli`), here is a link with all instructions for your OS.
https://www.speedtest.net/apps/cli
